alert.note: Alert for Inland Bay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 12:08PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Jackson, southeastern Bay and Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through 1245 PM EDT/1145 AM CDT/... At 1207 PM EDT/1107 AM CDT/, residual wind gusts near 40 mph are following an earlier line of thunderstorms. Some of these winds were along a line extending from 10 miles southeast of Cottonwood to 13 miles northwest of Blountstown to near Tyndall Air Force Base. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Callaway, Blountstown, Marianna, Port St. Joe, Springfield, Mexico Beach, Hiland Park, Tyndall Air Force Base, Chattahoochee, Parker, Malone, Sneads, Grand Ridge, Greenwood, Altha, Bascom, Moose Pond and Clarksville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 PM EDT/200 PM CDT/ for Big Bend of and the Panhandle of Florida...and southwestern Georgia.
